summary: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.
cast: Delphine Seyrig|Giorgio Albertazzi|Sacha Pitoëff|Françoise Bertin|Luce Garcia-Ville|Héléna Kornel|Françoise Spira|Karin Toche-Mittler|Pierre Barbaud|Wilhelm von Deek|Jean Lanier|Gérard Lorin|Davide Montemurri|Gilles Quéant|Gabriel Werner|Alan Edwards
title: El año pasado en Marienbad
